name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
SPRING 2012
Week　　Content
1　　Orientation
2-4　　Reading Unit 11~12 & Listening Unit 11~12:
Who are some famous philanthropists?
What do you know about deserts?
5-7　　Reading Unit 13~14 & Listening Unit 13~14:
What are some different kinds of Houses?
What is some traditional clothing from around the world?
8　　Reading Unit 15 & Listening Unit 15:
What are some man-made islands?
9　　Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
10-11　　Reading Unit 16 & Listening Unit 16~:
What do you know about sports?
12-4　　Reading Unit 17~18 & Listening Unit 17~18:
What do you know about Australia?
What are some national emblems?
15-17　　Reading Unit 19~20 & Listening Unit 19~20:
What do you know about the Ancient Greeks?
How did the Nobel Peace Prize start?
18　　Final Exam and Proficiency Test
